paper_abstract: We study a hybrid MIP/CP solution approach in which CP is used for detecting infeasibilities and generating cuts within a branch-and-cut algorithm for MIP. Our framework applies to MIP problems augmented by monotone constraints that can be handled by CP. We illustrate our approach on a generic multiple machine scheduling problem, and present a number of computational experiments. (c) 2005 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Detecting infeasibility and generating cuts for mixed integer programming using constraint programming
